user_instruction: 'Send Susan the proposal for the team retreat (susan@brighthorizonsms.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Team Retreat Proposal

Hi John,

Could you please send me the latest version of the team-retreat proposal at your earliest convenience? Kindly email it to susan@brighthorizonsms.com. Please be sure Mark’s requirements are fully reflected.

Feel free to check your Gmail and our Notion workspace if you need to pull any supporting information or attachments.

Thank you!

Best,  
Susan

final_output:
